seo: ecshop,sql注入漏洞,检测,poc,用户名密码
summary: 该插件用于检测Ecshop系统的collection_list功能是否存在SQL注入漏洞，通过构造特定的payload并登录系统进行验证。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether there is an SQL injection vulnerability in the collection_list function of the Ecshop system, and verifies it by constructing specific payloads and logging into the system.
